game.name: REC in Peace
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: REC in Peace is a co-op game for 2-6 players, controlled through your camera and microphone. Complete challenges using your voice and gestures. Each round introduces a new mini-game – and leaves fewer players standing. Eliminate your opponents to survive and escape the Maniac’s grasp.
